lead_paragraph: Colorado sophomore linebacker Terran Hasselbach was asleep in the passenger seat as his father drove them home from football practice. The crash remains nothing but a blur.

headline.print_headline: After Car Accident, Colorado's Hasselbach Grateful to Play
headline.main: After Car Accident, Colorado's Hasselbach Grateful to Play
